branchCategory.name: LEPS, Electric Actuator Miniature Slide Table Type, Step Motor (Servo/24VDC)
branchCategory.description: The LEPS electric actuator fits a linear guide and work table to the LEPY miniature rod model. The result is an actuator with parallel and perpendicular work surfaces, able to resist offset moment loads and rotational forces. The series includes two body sizes with inline mounted motors. Maximum stroke is 75mm, and maximum work load is 2 kg, or 50N pushing force depending on the application.
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Body sizes: 6, 10 <LI>Strokes: 25, and 50 mm <LI>Mounting : Side ( through or tapped), bottom tapped <LI>Motor cable entry selectable from 4 directions <LI>Basic and compact motor sizes available for size 10 <LI>Workpiece can be attached to top or front of table</LI></UL>
